title: Orange sesame chicken with broccoli and noodles

ingredients.content: 1 orange, zest (no white pith) and flesh
700 g skinless chicken thigh fillets, cut into pieces (3 cm)
400 g broccoli, cut into florets (approx. 3 cm)
2 spring onions/shallots, trimmed and cut into slices

preparations.content: Place all sauce ingredients into mixing bowl and cook <b>4 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, then simmer <b>5 min/90°C/speed 1<b>.
Blend <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>, <b>increasing speed gradually from speed 4 to speed 9,<b> until smooth.

Add ghee, chicken, salt and pepper to mixing bowl and cook <b>10-15 min/90°C//speed 1<b>, until chicken is cooked. Transfer into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and cover to keep warm. Rinse and dry mixing bowl.
Place water into mixing bowl, place Varoma into position and weigh broccoli into it. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>14 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma.

Add soba noodles to mixing bowl through hole in mixing bowl lid. Place Varoma back into position and cook <b>3 min/Varoma//speed 2<b>. Divide broccoli, noodles and chicken mixture with sauce between serving bowls, then garnish with spring onions/shallots and sesame seeds to serve.
